destinations.intro: From the Old New World to the novel frontier beyond
destinations.description: Located in Cape Canaveral, Florida, Neil Armstrong Interplanetary Spaceport is the premier gateway for North, Central, and South America to the wider Solar System. Rising from the very coastline where humanity first leapt to the Moon, it now connects millions across two hemispheres to orbital habitats, the lunar cities, Martian settlements, and deep-space destinations. It embodies the spirit of exploration that has defined the Americas for centuries, where innovation, diversity, and bold adventure take flight together.

destinations.description: Nestled in the heart of the asteroid belt, Ceres Prime is humanityâ€™s leading industrial outpost in space, as well as the busiest free trade zone in the Solar System.
